name: Phig
culture_notes: Riveric Dialect dominant with coastal loanwords
Ancestor offerings integrated into fishing rites
diet: salted fish, fermented sea vegetables
boatcraft includes ritual carvings and painted sigils
constraints: Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Long-range mind-influence rare and institutionally banned
notes: State affiliation unknown; local governance by elders
Population unknown; functions as a small service port
Navigational auguries used but do not replace charts
